trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.SplitButton"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> can be checked.

`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> cannot be checked.
`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse>.
`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll>.
`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform>.
`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer>.
`patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.

Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> can be checked.
Use <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System#Windows#Automation#Provider#IToggleProvider#Toggle"></xref> instead.

Cycles through the checked states of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> cannot be checked.

Gets the checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.

The checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
